replies.body:
Also Christmas isn't just about getting presents :/ its about having the whole family there and being happy, which is what they hopefully had and which was way more important to them than having tons of stuff.

As for me I just got some new clothes for going out, Paco Rabanne, a new alarm clock cause my old one was annoying the hell out of me, and driving lessons starting January :O That was enough for me :)

replies.body: I just had the same thing, the lung problem you have is chest congestion, you can help it though in a number of ways, medicine or hot showers with steam, drinking warm water and if you don't take a shower put your head over a steaming hot bowl of water then a towel over you and it will help tremendously, I know the pain it hurts SO MUCH.
